Description:
Indicates that a password spray attack has been successfully performed.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Password Spray Activity
Query: sourcetype='azure-riskdetection' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'passwordspray'
